summary:
Finally standalone version!!!!
This is my first follower mod....so be patient if something goes wrong!
descriptionHtml:
STANDALONE VERSION RELEASED!!!
This is a follower mod based on the character of Elsa from Disney Film FROZEN!
She is a beautifull nord girl and expert ice mage follower she can also conjure Frost Atronach like in the film (in Frozen she summon Ice golem), you can find her in whiterun inside "The Drunken Huntsman". She is auto-level (level up with player).
It comes with Hi-Res Body Texture, is based on CBBE body...not more UNPB-So you do not need a BBP skeleton- and a standalone outfit (White dress in the picture). I've decided to meke her not essential (she can die) that's becouse you are the DRAGONBORN a GREAT HERO and you will protect her with your own life!!! (or die trying!). If you want you can also marry her!

This is my first mod so please be patient if something goes wrong and please feel free to upload your screenshots, to leave comments, suggestion, or report any issue. I'm also plannig on make "Olaf" the little snowman from Frozen i do not know if i'll be able to do it, but i want to try!! :D

ENJOY!

REQUIREMENTS:
ONLY LASTEST SKYRIM UPDATE.

RECOMMENDED MOD:
Fire and Ice Overhaul by Apollodown (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43241/?)
CREDITS AND THANKS
All credits and thanks go to:
Bethesda for Skyrim and Creation Kit;
Disney for Frozen;
Naihaan Kragnaidael for Elven Dresses (white dress in the pictures);
Hellosanta for SGHAIRPACK and SG female textures renewal the is the link to a video that show off all the hairs and ther is also a download link for who is interested(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QjIIlIJ20ko)
Caliente for CBBE;
Bagserk for his tutorial on Standalone follower creation.

PERMISSIONS
Do not post, upload or use part of this mod without my explicit permission!
author: lucazzomio
